sidebar.title: Wishlist
sidebar.para: Even though TortoiseSVN and TortoiseMerge are free, you can support the developers by sending in patches and play an active role in the development. You can also help to cheer us up during the endless hours we spend in front of our computers.

While working on TortoiseSVN we love to listen to music. And since we spend many hours on the project we need a lot of music. Therefore we have set up some wish-lists with our favourite music CD's and DVD's:
The media wish list for Stefan is at these places: english (Amazon.com), english (Thinkgeek.com) german (Amazon.de)
Lübbe has got an
english (Amazon.com)
and a
german (Amazon.de)
wishlist too.
Please have a look at the list of people who contributed to the project by sending in patches or translations.
